mapper.select: SELECT anti_pick.id, anti_pick.hero_id, anti_pick.anti_hero_id, anti_pick.reason, anti_pick.created, anti_pick.modified, h1.name as hero_name, h1.image_name as hero_image_name, h2.name as anti_hero_name, h2.image_name as anti_hero_image_name FROM anti_pick LEFT JOIN hero as h1 ON anti_pick.hero_id = h1.id LEFT JOIN hero as h2 ON anti_pick.anti_hero_id = h2.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO anti_pick( hero_id, anti_hero_id, reason, created, modified ) values( #{heroId}, #{antiHeroId}, #{reason}, NOW(), NOW() )
